node.title: ASI Presents: Lift Him Up - In Action!
node.description: This year ASI Presents will be something you won’t want to miss! Beautiful, uplifting music will be brought to us by Fountainview Academy, interspersed with powerful testimonies from ASI members sharing Christ in their marketplace and at this year’s Pathway to Health initiatives. If you are anxious to see how God is working and looking for over-the-top inspiration and encouragement, this is the place to be!
